actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make it easier for tax-exempt bonds to be issued to provide electric power facilities for rural areas.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make certain private business tests inapplicable to electric power facilities for rural areas with respect to tax-exempt private activity bonds.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make it easier for tax-exempt bonds to be issued to provide electric power facilities for rural areas.
